{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Winking Audr |image = Female Human F Convo.png |image2 = PE2 Winking Audr.png |caption = |race = Elf |subrace = Pale |gender = Female |culture = [Aedyr](/aedyr/) |background = |faction = [Bleak Walkers](/bleakWalkers/) |deity = |personality = |class = Paladin |level = 15 |MIG = 13 |CON = 12 |DEX = 12 |PER = 13 |INT = 12 |RES = 13 |location = [Bent Bough Forest](/bentBoughForest/) |quests = |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = |head = Hood (Deadfire){{!}}Hood |neck = Cape (Deadfire){{!}}Cape |body = Superb Leather Armor (Deadfire){{!}}Superb Leather Armor |weapon1 = Superb Stiletto (Deadfire){{!}}Superb Stiletto |weapon1_offhand = Superb Rapier (Deadfire){{!}}Superb Rapier |internalname = CHA_00_Crew_Audr
CRW_Audr |guid = a512d48d-a8b0-4877-83ae-052a2788cf03" }} '''Winking Audr''' is a character and recruitable [crew member](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireCrewMembers/) in {{poe2}}. ## Background Audr was tricked by the Grand Harvester into joining the Sanguine Harvest, leaving her home and her partner, Wifruth behind. Unknowingly, she ended up as their monthly sacrifice to fampyrs as part of a ritual to strengthen the [Sanguine Great Sword](/sanguineGreatSword/), but not before being saved by the Watcher. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |crew = {{crewrank|3|navigator}}
{{crewrank|1|deckhand}}
Personality: Loyal, Professional |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = |none = |other = * You can choose to save her in the [Bent Bough Forest](/bentBoughForest/) scripted interaction, after which you can ask her to join your crew. }} ## Trivia * Winking Audr is one of a few characters that use a player portrait as their conversation portrait. [Category:Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire crew members](/categoryPillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireCrewMembers/)
